item.title: *Changing level requirements for Capes, Rings, and Necklaces [PI]
item.dc:creator: @david20x6 david20x6
item.description:
@david20x6 wrote:

The title says it all; I need help adding level requirements for capes, rings, and necklaces for an expansion on the server im working on. I tried adding them into itemassistant.java by adding “if(itemName.contains(” ***** cape")) {
c.defenceLevelReq = ****;
}"
and then following that up by adding the case:
“case *****:
c.defenceLevelReq = ****;
return;”
but ingame there still are no requirements on any of the capes, rings, and necklaces ive added. I have added level requirements to various weapons and armor, but these accessories seem to be giving me trouble. if anyone has any insight as to how to fix this it will be greatly appreciated. I am using a trisidiax/insidiax source, but it is compatible with PI.
Thanks, David

Read full topic
item.source: *Changing level requirements for Capes, Rings, and Necklaces [PI]
